greetingText: I think it's your special day today!
wishText: Hopefully all your dreams and wishes come true this year! (From: Sean Kepala De Auls)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you my pretty girl! Hope you enjoy this gift!
text3: Which is a huge milestone that deserves to be celebrated
text4: And I really wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
